In the plot, a city in the state of Washington awakens to the surreal sight of North Korean paratroopers dropping from the sky, after the United States being invaded and taken over by foreign forces. Quickly and without warning, the citizens find themselves prisoners and place under enemy occupation. Determined to resist bravely, a group of students decided to form a militia to confront the invaders. Remake of youthful adventure starring Patrick Swayze and Charlie Sheen for almost thirty years.
